name: Jewel Lines HD
description:
Build a line of five or more jewels of the same color to remove them from the board. If the board fills up – the game is over.


“Brilliant and relaxing! ”
“Great fun! What an awesome app!”
"Fast and accurate gameplay, gorgeous graphics - you have to try this one - A+" 

Three game variations:
- Classic. There is no time limit and you get three new pieces after each move that did not produce a line
- Time Limited. New jewels will drop down after a time period. The higher the level – the faster they come. You can also speed up the timer by taping on it.
- Classic + time Limited variant is the combination of two and is most likely the hardest one.
